title: WTB: 100 or so low grade T206s...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: WTB: 100 or so low grade T206s...
posts.post_content:
I have no intention of pursuing the monster, I'm just looking for a grouping of cards to hold and flip through on occasion.

I'm not looking for super beaters.  I'd be willing to pay $10-$12 per card depending on their appearance.

If you should have such a grouping of cards, I'd appreciate a PM.
